txt.en:
You relay what Limril said to you.

'Ah, I see. I was afraid I had made some misstep.'

He sighs and runs his hand down his face.

'It has been a trying several months. We have all taken my brother's death very hard. Limril and I try to keep our spirits up especially in front of the children. As you can see, this does not always work.'
'Before you leave, we would love if you could join us for dinner. Surely even you must need a rest after such hard labour?'
Supper has concluded and Gladion has moved outside for some fresh air.\n\nSpeak to Gladion in the field next to his house.
Gladion has invited you to dine with his family again.
'Limril will be delighted to see you.'
Gladion has invited you to join him and his family for dinner.\n\nTalk to him when you're ready to go inside.
